Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the idea that the Kotelawala Defense University hospital will be reserved exclusively for VIP patients.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that the hospital will only treat VIP patients.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the hospital will prioritize VIP patients over others, which is not supported by the hospital officials' statements.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim ignores the alternative explanation provided by the hospital officials that the hospital will be open to all COVID-19 patients, regardless of their status.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the statements made by Dr. Seetha Arambepola, a member of the Presidential Task Force, and Brigadier Chandana Wickramasinghe, the Sri Lanka Army spokesperson, who both confirmed that the hospital will treat all COVID-19 patients.
Falters at times: The claim falters in accurately representing the hospital's policy by spreading misleading information.
